page.title: 09SUBJECT OPTIONS AT SCHOOL
page.content: {*}When you are transferred from a primary school to a secondary school not only is the system different,but you are also taught a whole series of different subjects,some of them completely new:mathematics,science, history,music,drama,art and craft, physical education and French. {*}In the second year we were able to do German as well. {*}In the third year science was divided into physics,chemistry and biology. {*}By the end of the third year we were in a good position to choose options. {*}I have chosen the following subjects:modular science,home economics,community studies,keyboard skills and business studies.English,mathematics and physical education are compulsory subjects.
